verbs.description: Since the election , I [V: ’ve] wondered why any nation should ever trust the U.S. or expect us to keep our promises again . A case in point is Trump ’s just - announced decision to pull out of JCPOA , the 2015 nuclear deal negotiated between the U.S. , China , Russia , Europe and Iran , in which Iran would give up its nuclear - weapons …
